titleStmt.title: The royal robe: or, A treatise of meeknesse. Upon Col. 3. 12. wholly tending to peaceablenesse. / By James Barker, minister of Redbourn in Hartfordshire.
titleStmt.author: Barker, James, Minister of Redbourn.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.M. for Robert Gibbs, at the golden-Ball in Chancery-lane.,
